# Installation

`kbtbr` is not on CRAN yet. You can install the current version from GitHub: 

```{r installation, eval=FALSE}
# using remotes 
remotes::install_github("CorrelAid/kbtbr")

# using devtools
devtools::install_github("CorrelAid/kbtbr")
```
